testcase.name: Register new users for GMI Bank

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given user is on the registration page......................................undefined And user enters ssn number as SSN...........................................undefined Then user enters firstname and lastname as firstname and lastname...........undefined When user provides address address..........................................undefined Then user provides mobilephone as mobilephone...............................undefined And user provides a username username.......................................undefined Then user provides email id as email........................................undefined When user enters the password as firstpassword..............................undefined And user confirms the new password secondpassword...........................undefined Then user clicks on register button and sees the success message as message.undefined
